summary: Two German soldiers have taken a Norwegian soldier as prisoner, on one of the coldest Scandinavian winter nights, during WW2. They are thankful when they find a lonely house out in the wilderness, but the house is not that cozy after all.
cast: Frederik von Lüttichau|Mats Reinhardt|Sondre Krogtoft Larsen|Evy Kasseth Røsten|Sigmund Sæverud|Anita Ihler|Ingvild Flikkerud|Heidi Ødegaard Mikkelsen|Espen Edvartsen|Sofie
title: The House
